Describes a peer.

### id(): String

The id of the peer

### multiAddresses(): String[]

multi addresses

### alias(): Optional&lt;String&gt;

The alias of the peer

### relation(): [Relation](#relation)

The type of peer

### connected(): boolean

`true` if this peer is connected

### gossip(): Optional&lt;[GossipDto](#gossipdto)&gt;

The gossip information of this peer
